title: 81/194/EEC: Commission Decision of 16 March 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Ortec gamma-X detector, model 2112-10175' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 16 March 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as "Ortec gamma-X detector, model 2112-10175" may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties (81/194/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "Ortec gamma-X detector, model 2112-10175", which is the subject of an application by the Danish Government of 8 September 1980, may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 March 1981.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 184, 15.7.1975, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 134, 31.5.1979, p. 1. (3) OJ No L 318, 13.12.1979, p. 32.
